name: colress-machine
short_effect: Wakes up the Crustle blocking the way in Seaside Cave.

flavor_text.sun-moon: A special device that wrings out the potential of Pokémon. It’s an imperfect prototype.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: A special device that wrings out the potential of Pokémon. It’s an imperfect prototype.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: A special device that wrings out the potential of Pokémon. It’s an imperfect prototype.
